subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Brian Vickers’s lap of 188.536 miles an hour in Nascar Sprint Cup qualifying at Michigan International Speedway put him on the pole for Sunday’s 3M Performance 400. It was the fifth career pole for Vickers, but the first for his team and his first since November 2006 at Texas, when he was driving for Hendrick Motorsports.
